src:
Setahun di Indonesia, DANA Hampir Tembus 30 Juta User
03 Nov 2019, 19:24 by Adinda Purnama Rachmani - detikInet


CEO DANA Vincent Iswara (Kiri) dan Senior Marketing Manager DANA Lim Wimawan (Kanan) dalam acara media gathering DANA di Kawasan MH Thamrin, Minggu, (3/11).Foto: Adinda Purnama Rachmani

Jakarta - Layanan dompet digital DANA sudah hadir selama satu tahun di Indonesia. Hingga Oktober 2019, hampir 30 juta user yang menggunakan aplikasi DANA."Hingga Oktober kami sudah mendapatkan 30 juta user DANA. Itu menjadi bukti jika masyarakat nyaman dengan benefitnya yang kami berikan dari tahun lalu. Feedback ini juga bukan dirasakan oleh DANA tetapi untuk merchant bisa menambah traffic mereka, dan user juga diuntungkan dengan adanya promo," ujar CEO DANA Vincent Iswara di Kawasan MH Thamrin, Jakarta Pusat, Minggu (3/11/2019).Vincent berharap dengan adanya transformasi pembayaran ini, masyarakat menjadi sadar untuk mulai beralih ke budaya transaksi digital yang lebih aman dan efisien."Kita akan menunjukkan manfaat yang diberikan dengan cashless payment yang user friendly dan dilengkapi dengan proteksi, tanpa menggunakan dompet," kata Vincent. Ia berharap program ini efektif dalam menyebarluaskan berbagai keunggulan transaksi digital nontunai di semua kalangan, terutama dalam mendorong percepatan pemberdayaan ekonomi nasional. "Kami optimistis Pesta DANA 11.11 akan membangun pemahaman baru bahwa perayaan 11.11 tidak lagi identik dengan pembelanjaan online di e-commerce saja, tapi juga semua pelaku ekonomi nasional, termasuk para pelaku usaha offline," tambah Vincent.Sebagai platform dompet digital, DANA memberikan jaminan keamanan 100% untuk cashless payment, di setiap transaksi digital. Selain itu, DANA juga menyajikan fitur inovatif sesuai dengan kebutuhan masyarakat di Indonesia. "Kami berharap program ini akan efektif menyebarluaskan berbagai keunggulan transaksi digital nontunai di semua kalangan, terutama dalam mendorong percepatan pemberdayaan ekonomi nasional," jelasnya. (ega/fay)
text:
One year in Indonesia, FUNDS Almost Penetrate 30 Million Users
03 Nov 2019, 19:24 by Adinda Purnama Rachmani - detikInet


DANA CEO Vincent Iswara (Left) and DANA Senior Marketing Manager Lim Wimawan (Right) at the DANA media gathering in MH Thamrin, Sunday (11/11). Photo: Adinda Purnama Rachmani

Jakarta - DANA digital wallet service has been present for one year in Indonesia. As of October 2019, nearly 30 million users are using the DANA application. "Until October we have got 30 million DANA users. That is proof that the community is comfortable with the benefits we have provided from last year. This feedback is also not felt by DANA but for merchants it can increase their traffic, and users also benefit from the promotion, "said DANA CEO Vincent Iswara in the MH Thamrin area, Central Jakarta, Sunday (11/03/2019). Vincent hopes that with this payment transformation, the public will become aware to start switching to a safer and more efficient digital transaction culture. "We will show the benefits provided by user friendly cashless payments and protection, without using a wallet," Vincent said. He hopes that this program will be effective in disseminating various advantages of non-cash digital transactions in all circles, especially in encouraging the acceleration of national economic empowerment. "We are optimistic that DANA 11.11 will build a new understanding that 11.11 celebrations are no longer synonymous with online spending in e-commerce alone, but also all national economic actors, including offline businesses," added Vincent. As a digital wallet platform, DANA provides guarantees 100% security for cashless payments, on every digital transaction. In addition, DANA also presents innovative features according to the needs of people in Indonesia. "We hope that this program will effectively disseminate the advantages of non-cash digital transactions in all circles, especially in encouraging the acceleration of national economic empowerment," he explained. (ega / fay)
